Guide.title: How to play Toca Life World with friends Online
Guide.description: To make your gaming experience even more fun
Guide.link:
To make your gaming experience even more fun, we want to teach you how to play Toca Life World with friends Online.

To playToca Life worldIt's a lot of fun, but if you add to that, playing with friends, the fun is even greater. So you have to read this complete article, you will be surprised by the information that we bring you.

How to play Toca Life World with friends Online

Toca Life is World is an excellent application for children from 6 years of age, and even for adults. Within this incredible universe, you can create your own world, letting your imagination run wild. Thus enhancing your creativity and extraordinary skills.

Notably Toca Life World, is considered a mega application, and it is that it contains all the titles of Toca Life. Which allows you to enjoy City, Office, Kitchen, Vacation and all the others, in a single title.

Within Toca Life World you can put all your capabilities to the limit, producing stories with your avatars. That is, with characters created by yourself. Which you can even customize.

It is important to note that Toca Life World is known for concentrating the imagination of children by showing them in some way what the world is like. And it is that you will not be alone in this world, because you will be accompanied by a large number of avatars, with whom you can play.

Now do you want to play Toca Life World with your friends Online? Sure you can. In fact, you have several alternatives that can be very useful. If you want to play with your friends, you can open Game Center and select the option to add friends. There you must enter the phone number or email of the friends with whom you want to play and that's it. Surely you have many friends to invite to be part of your stories.

Now that you know how to play Toca Life World with friends Online, then get ready to spend hours having fun. And the best thing is that you will no longer play alone. You just have to enter Toca Life World and live new fun adventures with your friends. Exploring new locations, where you can create extraordinary stories.

Guide.title: How to Change House in Toca Boca
Guide.description: If you are already a mod veteran,
Guide.link:
How to Change House in Toca Boca

EnToca Bocaeach of the players has the option of being able to acquire a house and even change it when they are no longer comfortable, because they want to have a larger space. The game offers excellent real estate alternatives such as the Bohemian House, the Misty House and the Apartment Block.

Depending on how you're progressing through the game, you'll want to do a house swap at Toca Life, to achieve that space you require and we will tell you how you can make the change of home.

The world ofToca Bocais in constant evolution and growth, updating itself with new characters, new locations, objects, which is why the concern arises that each user is renewing himself adapting to all the changes that occur in the game. This is where the need to look for a house with a larger space is born.

How to change your house for a larger one

Since you start in the game, you become the owner of a house with a free but very basic pack, to which you can make certain improvements in appearance but not in size.

 The new places that arise give users the opportunity to Toca Boca to do everything to have the dream house in unique places that you can also decorate according to the style you prefer. The possibilities are endless.

It is there where you see the need to buy other packs that allow you to have better space in your home in a better area. These structures have a space that exceeds the standard size of a common house, allowing the avatar to have the objects they want comfortably.

How to get your new house in Toca Boca

En Toca Boca Getting a house according to the trend of your style does not represent a difficulty. It is extremely simple and you can build your house with the characteristics you prefer. To purchase your new home along with the furniture and accessories, you must purchase the Pack together with its respective location.

And to obtain the house, you must go to the green shopping cart, locate the new house in which you want to live and make the purchase following the steps that are indicated, and in just minutes you are the new owner of the housing structure. .

Don't limit yourself and keep growing as you goToca Lifeand get, among other things, your favorite house just by following the recommendations given.

Guide.title: How to download Toca Life World on PC
Guide.description: If you are already a mod veteran,
Guide.link:
How to download Toca Life World on PC

There are many video games designed for Android that make their users want to have a PC version, and one of them is Toca LifeWorld. Becauseis intended exclusively for this operating system, it is difficult to get a desktop version, but it is not impossible.

So you can see that everything has a solution, we teach youhow to downloadToca Life worldon PCusing an effective method.

How to download Toca Life World on PC: Easy and Fast

There are a series of tricks that allow you to use different applications on your PC, even if the desktop version of the program is not available. Thanks to them you can use a video game on your computerjust as you would use it on your mobile device without inconvenience.

Like other games, Toca Life worldcan only be developed on Android OS, but there are emulators that will help you do it on your PC. There are several programs of this type, but below we will show you the two most reliable and popular:

Play Toca Life World with Bluestacks

Bluestacks is a very functional Android emulator thatallows you to run any application on your computer. To download the game using this program, you must follow this process:

  1. Download and install Bluestacks on your PC, and then launch it.
  2. Wait patiently until you can see the home screen of the emulator.
  3. In it, search for Google Play Store, and double-click on the icon to open the store.
  4. In the search engine write Toca Life World and search for the app.
  5. When you find it, press the “Install” icon, which will start the installation of the game on your PC.

Then you only have to search for the game among the installed applications, dodouble click on it and start using it on your computer.

Play Toca Life World with MEmu Play

This software is designed exclusively for gaming, andIt is characterized by being flexible and very fast.. With this emulator, the game installation steps are as follows:

  1. Download MEmu Play on your PC and install it from its official website.
  2. Open the emulator once installed and search for the Google Play Store Game from the home screen of the app, by double clicking on it.
  3. In the store, look for Toca Life World and make sure you find the official game developed by Toca Boca, and press the “Install” button.
  4. After installation, search Toca Life World in the emulator and start playing it just like you do on your mobile.

Guide.title: Foods you can make in Toca Boca
Guide.description: If you are already a mod veteran,
Guide.link:
Foods you can make in Toca Boca

Toca Life worldis an application created especially for children over 6 years old, in which they can develop all their imagination by putting their creativity into practice to make their own world and represent the stories in a digital universe. Among the innovations that this spectacular game presents, each character can become a chef, in which they can prepare exquisite recipes.

Decide the lifestyle you want to lead your avatar withinToca Life world,That includes eating habits. But keep in mind that there are ingredients that are somewhat difficult to obtain, and the way to achieve this is to answer the questions that are being asked on the networks.

In order to cook, the player must go out in search of the ingredients within the community, and these can be found by shape, size and essences. It also has a recipe book that adapts to the user's taste that teaches how to prepare from simple dishes to special meals such as vegan ones.

The foods you can prepare in Toca Life world

Toca Mouth,It has an extensive recipe book available to the players and that adapts to all tastes. In this book you will find the instructions that will guide you to prepare dishes such as:

  • you need to have for its preparation a steak and potatoes.
  • the noodles are combined with any type of meat, seafood, fish or even tofu, without missing the cheese in the preparation.
  • You can choose between the varieties of bread and red or white meats, and add legumes and dairy products such as tomato and cheese.
  • You just have to have bread and sausage to make the recipe.
  • it is the most popular preparationof the communityToca Life worldand it only requires rice and a large fish.
  • To prepare this meal, you need a package of tofu and a package of pasta, and you already have these ingredients in the game's kitchen.
  • It comes in two versions, alone or you can combine them with cheese.
  • you need for this exotic recipe small fish and potatoes cut into pieces.
  • you must have the pizza base package, plus tomatoes, cheese, sausage, hot pepper and mushrooms. If you want it to be a vegetarian pizza, you just use the tortilla and the tomato.
  • its ingredients are variable, you can use for its preparation, red meats, fish, raw chicken, tofu and even sausages.

Guide.title: how to fix up a mansion Toca Boca
Guide.description: If you are already a mod veteran,
Guide.link:
how to fix up a mansion Toca Boca

If something characterizes the platform ofToca Mouth,is that the creators of the game have taken great care to care for and provide content, where the little ones can develop activities that provide fun and creativity in various spaces within the community.

And part of these spaces consist of properties ranging from small houses to huge mansions that players can acquire to fix them up, improving their appearance by decorating them, giving them the personal touch they prefer. Turn your home into a brilliantly luxurious mansion, and flaunt the life of a millionaire in the communityToca Boca.

Give your personal touch to your mansion in Toca Life

One of the funniest and most entertaining things in the world ofToca Bocais to fix and decorate your property according to your tastes and creativity. This is why you need a series of tips and recommendations on how to fix a mansion inToca Lifeand be able to decorate it according to your style.

Enjoy this activity spending your time in the game to unleash your imagination and create the best environments in your mansion, use furniture and accessories that highlight the beauty of your home.

how to fix up a mansion Toca Boca

When you already own a mansion, which you acquired by following the instructions once you enter thislink, and that you have placed it in the place of your choice, you proceed to arrange the multiple rooms of your modern mansion, but keep in mind that you will need money to acquire the accessories and furniture required for this purpose.

There are many alternatives that you can take into account for the decoration of your mansion, as there are properties that include “a pack”that allows you to personalize it, changing or considering them according to your criteria. However, each structure has a theme, so each room revolves around the concept of space. Despite this, you decide what accessories and furniture to leave, what to replace or what to remove to achieve the goal of improving your mansion in the community.Toca Life.

Guide.title: How to Open the Octopus Toca Life Vacation
Guide.description: If you are already a mod veteran,
Guide.link:
How to Open the Octopus Toca Life Vacation

Toca Life Vacationis an exclusive platform where the most varied game worlds are concentrated that does not limit its users to create and have fun in which you can create your own stories and go in search of challenges to discover mysterious treasures in this universe ofToca Mouth.

As in all multiplayer games, each avatar will find endless surprises and will have to solve the mysteries that lie within the universe of Toca Mouth. Each event that is presented to the players generates fun and an increase in adrenaline. Among these mysteries to be solved and that many want to know is howOpen the Octopus inToca Life Vacation.

What is Octopus in Toca Life Vacation?

En Toca LifeVacation,There is a statue located on the game map known as "The Octopus". This piece has been of great interest to all players in the universe toca mouth, since it arouses curiosity by discovering what it contains inside. This great secret can be revealed when trying to open the image, for which you need to follow some recommendations to achieve it.

How to Open the Octopus Toca Life Vacation

  • To achieve the objective of this challenge that is presented to you within Toca Boca, you have to correctly complete the following steps:
  • First of all you must locate the Octopus on the game map to start the mission. Once you have located it and reached it, continue with the following sequence to open the octopus.
  • Tocar on two occasions one of the two tentacles that glow and are located on the left side of the octopus.
  • Then visualize the ice cream that the octopus is holding, approach it and press twice
  • In another of its tentacles it is holding a hot dog which you must tocar also twice.

Treasure content inside the Octopus

Once you have followed these instructions, you only have to wait a few seconds until the octopus's head slowly opens completely and you can discover the hidden treasure to be able to appropriate it.

Its content is a secret. To make it much more fun, we invite you to discover it for yourself, you just have to get going, rest assured that incredible, unique and incomparable gifts await you atOpen Octopus Toca LifeVacation.

Guide.title: How to Buy Things in Toca Boca
Guide.description: If you are already a mod veteran,
Guide.link:
How to Buy Things in Toca Boca

If you are starting as a player inToca lifeworld,and you do not know how to buy things in the game, here we will teach you how to acquire objects and accessories that you want to own within the great community of Toca Mouth.

One of the easiest things you find in the game is to buy things that in turn give you many benefits when you get them. in the world of Toca Boca you can buy what you want even when you are a minor if you have the prior authorization of your parents or representatives. It is so simple that you can do it without help. It's time to learn how to shop for things inToca Life world.

How to Buy Things in Toca Boca

Making purchases in this spectacular game is not complicated at all, you only need to select the object that you want to have among your belongings, to have access to the content available for purchase. To make purchases of things it is important to follow the following indications that we suggest below:

  • As a first step you must enter the gameToca lifeworld,In the upper left corner there is a green shopping cart that you must click on.
  • A list of the store is immediately displayed with the content of all the things available for sale in Toca Mouth.
  • Proceed to select the item of your choice that you want to purchase. Proceed to click on “Buy”.
  • You must validate the process by placing the data with the date of birth of the person who is going to pay for the item and enter the username and password or fingerprint.
  • Once the process has been validated, you complete the purchase operation, and you already have the object to be able to enjoy it because it is already part of your belongings.

Without complications, the player can acquire anything just by completing this purchase procedure inToca Mouth.

Guide.title: How to Buy a House in Toca Life world
Guide.description: If you are already a mod veteran,
Guide.link:
How to Buy a House in Toca Life world

Since you join as a frequent player of the communityToca Life world,you can realize that the houses are fundamental pieces within the video game. One of the first properties that you acquire from the beginning is a free pack of a standard house that comes with the furniture and basic objects to make it your main home.

These houses can be located in new areas that are constantly being created, so the location of the houses does not represent any inconvenience when choosing the place where you want to locate a real estate structure. And if there is something you can do in your new home, it is that you can choose the style and you can decorate it to your liking.

Where can I buy a residential property in Toca Life?

In order for a user to acquire a property, they must go to the website ofToca lifeworld,and enter as usual to start playing. Once inside the game, the search for the point where you want to have your new house begins. At the bottom, centered, there is an icon in the shape of a blue hammer, which you must click to show you the spaces to choose to place the new house. Each place has a plus sign next to it"+".

How to buy a house in Toca LifeWorld?

pressing the sign"+"in the place where you want to locate your house inToca Life, is displayed on the right side in the store, the option“Discover new things”,with a list of the models of houses built. Press and wait for it to load to show you the houses, select the one you like on the green button"+",and click on"To buy".To finalize the purchase of the house you must enter the date of birth of the person who will make the payment to complete the successful acquisition of your new residence.

After purchase. Go to the place you selected to locate the house. Click on the blue hammer with the description“new items available”, selectand press the buttons the property "+"y"Build",construction of the house will begin immediately, and when it is ready you can enter to give it your personal touch and show it to everyone.

Guide.title: How to Buy Houses in Toca Life world
Guide.description: If you are already a mod veteran,
Guide.link:
How to Buy Houses in Toca Life world

EnToca Life world,the houses are representative and essential in the game, because since the users enter the community they start by having a free property and then additionally acquire other larger houses that give greater benefits within the game.

The way you have to be able to acquire a new home you must enter the game "Toca Life world",direct you to where you want your new home to be located. Once there, at the bottom, towards the center of the screen, a blue hammer-shaped icon appears, which you must click and immediately several sites marked with the sign will be displayed."+", so that you choose the location site to place your property.

How to Buy Houses in Toca Life world

Continuing with the process mentioned above, select the button"+"and a kind of list of the houses that you have previously built will be displayed. There scroll to the right side until the option"Store" and click on “discover new homes”. When loading, go in search of the one you like the most, select the green button of"+"to execute the purchase. Later, we enter the date of birth and the password or fingerprint and with that the purchase is concluded.

After having bought the property, we go to the indicated place where the blue hammer icon is displayed, which in this opportunity indicates that new items are available, click on it, and select the recently acquired house again in the icon"+" to select the exact place where the house will be, then press the box"Build"and then the building process begins. At the end of the construction, enter your new house so you can start enjoying everything new that comes with it and start decorating it and inviting your friends to meet you.

Guide.title: How to Buy the Modern House of Toca Boca
Guide.description: If you are already a mod veteran,
Guide.link:
How to Buy the Modern House of Toca Boca

For players who make life in the worldToca lifeworld,the environment where you are located is of great importance. The options are endless where the houses of each of the characters can be located, and depending on the style and size they are signs of higher status in the game.

From the basic ones when you start in the game, to the most modern ones, there are many styles and designs that the housing properties inToca Boca. Depending on how you progress in the game, it is important to have more space where you can put all the objects you acquire. This is why the size of the house is relevant, because it offers benefits, in addition to the comfort that a modern house allows you.

Considerations to acquire a modern house of Toca Boca

The alternatives to acquire a property are very diverse, which represents a reason why the users of the community Toca Life are looking for suitable real estate options according to your need for space. Among the options that are presented are the buildings are:

  • The Apartment Block
  • The Bohemian House
  • The Misty House
  • The Modern House

Each of them with defined styles, so their decorations are already pre-established; however, you can make adjustments to them.

There are promotions from time to time, where the secret packs bring new locations that contain spaces at excellent prices, so you should consider looking first in other scenarios that allow you to expand in the game.

Steps to follow to buy the modern house of Toca Boca

To carry out the purchase of a modern house you only have to carry out the following steps:

When you are advanced in the game, request the authorization of your parents. Then go to the green shopping cart, look for the pack that contains the modern house, click to buy following the indications that the "store" poses. Validate the purchase with the date of birth of the person who pays. And that's it, you already have a nice property in just a short procedure.

After completing the previous process, all you have to do is place it in the place of your choice to be able to inhabit it and enjoy your modern home.

Guide.title: How to get the green diamond Toca Boca
Guide.description: If you are already a mod veteran,
Guide.link:
How to get the green diamond Toca Boca

En Toca Life worldthe amount of precious stones are of great value to the users of the game. These beautiful gems are considered the greatest mysteries because they are hidden in both remote and nearby places. To collect the diamonds, each user must undertake a search mission, in which they must make a tour of the various locations ofToca Life world.

The value and use of diamonds within the community Toca Boca

Diamonds in the communityToca LifeWorld, are characterized by their beauty, color and usefulness. They represent an exclusive benefit for the players, because it allows them not only to show them off to the other users of the platform, but they are also a type of currency that allows them to acquire kitchen items and accessories, to make aesthetic changes in Hair Style Salon. .

By gathering the complete collection of all these precious stones through the guides or content created by the followers of Toca Boca, the player will have access to free content and worlds, as well as buying exclusive items and accessories.

How to get the Green Diamond in Toca Boca

The search for the precious gem can be a long but very fun one where players are drawn to the challenge of finding the gem to add to their collection. It's time to start the quest to discover where the Green Diamond is hidden inToca LifeWorld.

As we already know, these highly valuable stones are scattered and kept clandestinely, so you must pay close attention and see the details and possible clues that are presented to you during the search. The most important clue has to do with the location of the Diamond.

In the case of this spectacular bright green you should go to the Theater, and enter the locker room area and visualize the drawer, open it and there you will see that the Emerald Diamond is hidden, once you take it it is already part of your collection of precious jewels. Do not wait to undertake this mission in Toca LifeWorld.

Guide.title: How to buy at Toca Life world
Guide.description: If you are already a mod veteran,
Guide.link:
How to buy at Toca Life world

Toca Life worldit's a universe where you can get a lot of great things that allow you to stand out among the other users of the game. Make your purchases in the universe Toca Life world

By simply viewing and selecting the object or accessory you want, you can now access all the content available for purchase. This is where the procedure begins to acquire what you want to add to your belongings, just by following the instructions below:

  • Enter the gameToca lifeworld,Go to the upper left corner where the green shopping cart is and proceed to click on it.
  • The varied list of objects available for sale for game users is displayed.
  • Choose and select the item of your choice and click on the "buy" tab.
  • Enter the date of birth of the person who pays for the item and then your password or fingerprint to validate the purchase.

With these simple steps, you complete the purchase operation so that you can enjoy the article you recently acquired, from the range of exclusive content that Boca Life offers its users.

Guide.title: Code of Toca Life world
Guide.description: If you are already a mod veteran,
Guide.link:
Code of Toca Life world

EnToca Bocait is common that to acquire the accessories and properties that also come with multiple benefits for more hours of enjoyment within the game, it is necessary that you have money to be able to obtain said objects. Even so, there are alternatives when you do not have real money to cover these types of benefits. One of them is the use of a Code that you can use as a payment method inToca Life world.

The faithful friend par excellence of the users is the Code of Toca Boca, because with it you can even buy a super house to include it in your world within the game without having to spend a single coin. The perfect option you need to add belongings and continue enjoying the benefits inToca Life.

The various elements found in the universeToca Life world, they can be yours, resorting to the choice of the use of code to achieve said things of your property. The fantastic of“Code 2000” is thatIt has the great advantage of being able to use it as many times as necessary.

How to use the code Toca LifeWorld?

The correct way to use the code Toca Boca, it is extremely easy and fast, in addition to being able to use it at any time you want. Just be attentive to these suggestions and follow the instructions below:

Access toToca Life worldand select the green shopping cart located in the upper left corner.

A list is displayed with the content of all the accessories and other objects that gives you multiple options from which you can choose to make the purchase.

Proceed to search the list and select the item of your choice, then press the button"purchase"in the Toca Mouth.

The purchase system requests the payment mechanism in which you are going to enter the"Code 2000", and immediately your purchase is completed, without having to pay with real money, that is, totally free.
